name: OKALOOSA COUNTY FLORIDA
sampleDescriptions: Favorable implementation of the RESTORE the Gulf Coast States Act (P.L 112-141), including grant assistance.

FY2018 and 2019 Transportation and Housing and Urban Development Appropriations Bill funding for surface transportation, TIGER grants, the Community Development Block Grant program and housing program
